requirements.summary: Deploy the StaySpread application to the Internet Computer network with all existing features intact
acceptanceCriteria: The application deploys successfully to the Internet Computer without errors
The frontend canister serves the React application at the deployed URL
The backend canister is reachable and all API calls from the frontend resolve correctly
All existing routes are accessible in the deployed app

file_operations.description: Update the PWA manifest start_url to use relative path '/' to ensure proper routing after deployment to the Internet Computer canister URL
Verify that the application entry point correctly initializes the React Query client and Internet Identity provider for deployment, ensuring no hardcoded localhost references remain
Ensure all asset references use relative paths and verify meta tags are production-ready for deployment to Internet Computer
Verify that the actor initialization properly handles production canister IDs and network configuration for deployment to Internet Computer mainnet
Ensure TanStack Router configuration uses hash-based routing or appropriate routing strategy that works with Internet Computer canister URL structure
Verify navigation links work correctly with the deployed canister URL structure and maintain proper routing behavior
Ensure URL parameter extraction and management functions correctly handle canister URL structure with query parameters and hash-based routing
Update service worker cache paths and fetch strategies to work with Internet Computer canister asset structure, ensuring offline PWA capabilities function correctly
